title: Outside centre is the best position for Manu Tuilagi - his England teammates can have a field day
text:
Manu Tuilagi is a 13, not a 12. There's no two ways about it in my mind. At inside centre, you are still running at back-rowers. You often take the first pass off a lineout and you are obviously a bit tighter. At outside centre, you are running against backs far more regularly. In simple terms, it is a lot harder to tackle Manu when you are smaller than him. Well, it’s hard to tackle him anyway. It’s nearly impossible when you are smaller than him.

As big as Manu is, he has a really good ability to skip out and run an ‘overs’ line – essentially fading on a pass. He has good speed as well, and his game awareness is underrated.

When he is at 13, he is always going to be committing two defenders...
description: Manu Tuilagi is a 13, not a 12.
